metadata.name: The Way to My Motherland #1
metadata.description:
The work is well-received as mastering simplicity with ink in color. Based on traditional philosophy, the artist puts a clear emphasis on expressing the appearance of nature not dominated by humanity. Bak Bang-youngâ€™s works represent the lyricism and rhythm of Korean traditional beauty, provoke nostalgia and get the worldwide reputation.
